    Augment Trackball Data

    augment_trackball.Rd

    Augment Trackball Data

    Usage

    augment_trackball(
  data,
  x,
  y,
  time = NULL,
  sampling_rate = 60,
  rollmean_k = 30,
  mouse_dpcm = 394
)

    Arguments

    data

    Data frame

    x

    Y-data from first sensor.

    y

    Y-data from second sensor.

    time

    Which variable contains time. If no column includes time, use sampling_rate.

    sampling_rate

    Sampling rate of the sensors.

    rollmean_k

    Parameter for smoothing filter.

    mouse_dpcm

    "Dots-per-cm" - or how little movement the mouse can detect.

    Value

    An augmented data frame

    On this page
